name: Rotations (Bob Games)
description:
A game made for ScoreSpace Jam #8. The theme was "balance".

Rotate the platforms to keep the ball balanced.

Design, art, music and sounds, and programming by me. Font from dafont. This game was inspired by Jonas Tryoller's video (7:26) where he made 50 games in one day.

I hope you enjoy and any feedback is appreciated!
